Comment: I started this game off with my normal plan: use the Grand Prix to gain an extrodinary attack. However, I noticed the high rating of my oppenent and was somewhat worried.  In this game, you will see a successful attack pulled off by originally reckless moves. I try extremely hard to end a game I thought I couldn't win.
